name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader for a haiku”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a great haiku”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to share a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader reads out a random haiku whenever you need one. If you ever need to feel more centered or Zen, then this is the skill for you.

Simply say something like, "Alexa, ask Haiku Reader for a haiku."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
